name: axa-ch_style-html-guide
description: style and html guide and demos for axa ch

scripts.build-js-dev: node_modules/.bin/cross-env BABEL_ENV=development node_modules/.bin/babel -d .tmp/ src/ && node stack/tasks/copy-vendors.js DEV
scripts.build-js-prod: node_modules/.bin/cross-env BABEL_ENV=production node_modules/.bin/babel -d dist/ src/ && node stack/tasks/copy-vendors.js PROD
scripts.build-dev: node stack/tasks/cleanup.js DEV && node stack/tasks/create-imports.js DEV && node stack/tasks/build.html.js DEV && npm run build-js-dev
scripts.build-prod: node stack/tasks/cleanup.js PROD && node stack/tasks/build.html.js PROD && node stack/tasks/create-imports.js PROD && npm run build-js-prod

author: luca.mele@axa-winterthur.ch
